column4: Would anyone with experience in soundcard configuration like to help me out? I would appreciate it a bunch
mine is that I can't get any sound from my new soundcard: a soundblaster audigy 4
Is anyone experienced with hardware troubleshooting, and would like to take a look on my case?
sort off.  what kind of hardware?
Static? elaborate... the problem is I've no sound since I put in my new sndcard, here is an interesting line from lspci: 0000:00:0d.0 Multimedia audio controller: Creative Labs: Unknown device 0008
Well, can't really help you as I don't get my Sound Blaster Audigy SE to work neither. :-/
But the Audigy SE isn't supported by alsa, right?
I think I read somewhere someone used oss? I might be mistaken though
correct.  but .. i'm waiting for support :D
I actually purchased this card only because sound quality of my older sb pci 128 was inferior in linux vs. windows and I want to use linux on fulltime
